transport


Packages

package  advection
 Module orchestrating the advection scheme. The main routine in the module is advection().
package  boundary_advection_module
 boundary advection interface to be fulfilled by driver or application
package  boundary_diffusion
 boundary diffusive flux interface to be fulfilled by driver or application
package  boundary_diffusion_matrix_module
 boundary diffusive matrix interface to be fulfilled by driver or application
package  diffusion
 Module orchestrating the diffusion scheme. The main routine in the module is diffuse(). Explicit and implicit diffusion operators are included here.
package  gradient
 Module containing routines for calculating differences and limiters.
package  hydro_data
 Hydrodynamics interface to be fulfilled by driver or application.
package  primitive_variable_conversion
 Module containing routines for converting mass to concentraion, and concentration to mass.
package  reaction
 Module orchestrating the reaction scheme. The main routine in the module is react().
package  source_sink
 Source interface to be fulfilled by driver or application Specifically, the user must set the "source" pointer (a variable in this module) to a subroutine that meets the compute_source interface.
package  state_variables
 Defines state variables for the transport problem as well as functions to allocate them.
package  stm_precision
 Definition of model precision, precision-related constants and special values.
package  stm_type
 Definition of model types.
